items.content_html: A Progressive Web App (PWA) that allows users to upload their Instagram data (ZIP file) and discover who doesn’t follow them back. The app is lightweight, user-friendly, and works seamlessly on both desktop and mobile devices.
items.title: dbosch99/CuCu-PWA: A Progressive Web App (PWA) that allows users to upload their Instagram data (ZIP file) and discover who doesn’t follow them back. The app is lightweight, user-friendly, and works seamlessly on both desktop and mobile devices.

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
items.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: Simple and lightweight React UI framework built with TypeScript. Perfect for rapid prototyping and building modern, responsive interfaces. If you're looking for a flexible, easy-to-use UI kit for your React projects, this repository has everything you need to get started quickly.
items.title: miksrv/simple-react-ui-kit: Simple and lightweight React UI framework built with TypeScript. Perfect for rapid prototyping and building modern, responsive interfaces. If you're looking for a flexible, easy-to-use UI kit for your React projects, this repository has everything you need to get started quickly.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript library for creating dynamic, draggable UI elements and controls for web applications. Particularly useful for canvas-based applications or HMIs (Human Machine Interfaces).
items.title: fdz-marco/StickyUI-JS: A lightweight JavaScript library for creating dynamic, draggable UI elements and controls for web applications. Particularly useful for canvas-based applications or HMIs (Human Machine Interfaces).

items.content_html: Linky — A lightweight, fast API server for controlling HomeKit devices remotely through Homebridge. Full REST API with secure authentication, dynamic key rotation, health metrics, and future WebSocket support.

items.content_html: 2025 SJHacks Hackathon Submission (Team #4) - HelpHub is a lightweight, mobile-optimized web app that empowers residents and visitors to access emergency assistance, city services, and community support with a simple QR scan.
items.title: Exidekat/helphub: 2025 SJHacks Hackathon Submission (Team #4) - HelpHub is a lightweight, mobile-optimized web app that empowers residents and visitors to access emergency assistance, city services, and community support with a simple QR scan.

items.content_html: MyExpress is a lightweight Node.js framework built on Express.js, designed for rapid web application development following the MVC architecture.
items.title: Gicehajunior/myexpress-framework: MyExpress is a lightweight Node.js framework built on Express.js, designed for rapid web application development following the MVC architecture.

items.content_html: Job Tracker API is a lightweight RESTful service built on Cloudflare Workers that helps manage job applications with full CRUD operations. It leverages OpenAPI 3.1 with chanfana and Hono for automatic documentation generation and request validation. The API uses SQLite/D1 for data persistence and provides clean error handling
items.title: Macktireh/job-tracker-api: Job Tracker API is a lightweight RESTful service built on Cloudflare Workers that helps manage job applications with full CRUD operations. It leverages OpenAPI 3.1 with chanfana and Hono for automatic documentation generation and request validation. The API uses SQLite/D1 for data persistence and provides clean error handling
